sqlMap.select: select id,member_id,consignee_id,coupon_id,order_no,count,current,amount,type,status,grind,cost,memo,create_time,modify_time from pinshe.order where create_time<=(select create_time from pinshe.order order by create_time desc limit #id#,1) order by create_time desc limit 100

select id,member_id,consignee_id,coupon_id,order_no,count,current,amount,type,status,grind,cost,memo,create_time,modify_time from pinshe.order where member_id=#member_id# and create_time<=(select create_time from pinshe.order where member_id=#member_id# order by create_time desc limit #id#,1) order by create_time desc limit 100

select id,member_id,consignee_id,coupon_id,order_no,count,current,amount,type,status,grind,cost,memo,create_time,modify_time from pinshe.order where id in (select order_id from pinshe.order_detail where store_id=#store_id#) and create_time<=(select create_time from pinshe.order where id in (select order_id from pinshe.order_detail where store_id=#store_id#) order by create_time desc limit #id#,1) order by create_time desc limit 100

select id,member_id,consignee_id,coupon_id,order_no,count,current,amount,type,status,grind,cost,memo,create_time,modify_time from pinshe.order where id in (select order_id from pinshe.order_detail where store_id>0) and create_time<=(select create_time from pinshe.order where id in (select order_id from pinshe.order_detail where store_id>0) order by create_time desc limit #id#,1) order by create_time desc limit 100
select id,member_id,consignee_id,coupon_id,order_no,count,current,amount,type,status,grind,cost,memo,create_time,modify_time from pinshe.order where status=#status# order by create_time desc
